Diagnostic Assessment and Achievement of College Skills Preface Research Team

Diagnostic Assessment and Achievement of College Skills DAACS Research Team May 26, 2017 Preface DAACS is a diagnostic assessment designed to help students transition to college. DAACS provides personalized feedback about studentsâ€™ strengths and weaknesses in terms of key academic and self-regulated learning skills, linking them to the resources to help them be successful students.
